title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Mitchell dies amid stunt week horror after dumping Cleo for Scott?
text:
(Picture: Lime pictures)

It’s been a tough couple of months for Mitchell Deveraux (Imran Adams) in Hollyoaks — what with him confused over his feelings for Scott Drinkwell (Ross Adams) — but his troubles are far from over as, upon taking the decision to end things with girlfriend Cleo McQueen (Nadine Mulkerrin), he finds himself caught up in the devastating events taking place within the village as part of the soap’s stunt week.

In the coming episodes, Mitchell and Scott take advantage of the alone time they’ve got together. However, problems soon arise when Mitchell receives a text from Cleo, which informs him that she’s on her way home. Upon her arrival, she makes an attempt to kiss Mitchell — but he pushes her away, and she’s left feeling rather insecure as a result.

Later in the week, Cleo opens up to Mercedes (Jennifer Metcalfe) about what happened, and Mercy offers her some advice about how to get the spark back in her relationship. As a result, Cleo summons Mitchell home for a sexy surprise, but she doesn’t get the reaction she was hoping for, and thus asks him why he finds her so repulsive.

Mitchell later confides in Scott, telling him that he doesn’t want to sleep with Cleo, as it would feel as if he’s cheating on Anita. As a result, he comes to a decision: he’s going to break up with Cleo.

Whether to not he follows through remains to be seen, but — as chaos ensues in the village later in the week — Mitchell and Anita sneak into the florists, unaware of the impending danger.

However, the pair soon realise something is awry, as the emergency services arrive. As they prepare to exit the premises, the door is jammed.

Will they manage to escape and make it to safety in time?

Or will they be caught in the crossfire?

One to watch: Tuesday 29th October at 7pm on E4.
